ygData.msgSnippet: The tiger fell down next to Lunarpine.  It moves slightly.  it let out a low mixture of a groan and a roar.  It moved it s paw and looked up at Lunarpine.

The tiger fell down next to Lunarpine.  It moves slightly.  it let 
out a low mixture of a groan and a roar.  It moved it's paw and 
looked up at Lunarpine.  then it drew in it's last breath and lay 
still.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine smiles at the tigers lack of fear as he squeezed the 
> trigger.
> "So some poor kids gonna grow up without a little kitty to hug."
> 
> (It aint curiosity but it'll do.)
>
